sentences.en: " The foreman'll fix that if you ask him, I guess.
sentences.cn: “ 我想你要是去问工头的话,他会安排的.

sentences.en: Early in December the foreman came along with generous provisions for Christmas.
sentences.cn: 十二月初,领班带来了供圣诞节享受的丰盛的食物.

sentences.en: He had never let a foreman see him slacking.
sentences.cn: 他从未在哪个工头面前表现出丝毫懈怠。

sentences.en: He still visited the dairy daily, but left most of the business details to his manager and foreman.
sentences.cn: 他仍然每天到乳品场看看，但把生意上大部分琐碎事务交给经理和工头打理。

sentences.en: The chief of these people is the general foreman.
sentences.cn: 这些人的领导人是总工长.

sentences.en: The foreman distributes the work every morning.
sentences.cn: 工头每天早晨分派工作.

sentences.en: The foreman ganged the men together.
The foreman here is in charge of twenty workmen.
sentences.cn: 这儿的领班负责20个工人.

sentences.en: The foreman jumped on the workers for the slightest fault.
sentences.cn: 哪怕工人有一点点微小的过失,那个工头就责怪他们.

sentences.en: The foreman passed slowly along, eyeing each worker distinctly.
sentences.cn: 工头慢慢地走过来, 打量着每个工人.

sentences.en: The head foreman , on his round, stopped by her machine.
sentences.cn: 工头在车间巡视时, 在她的机器旁停了下来.

sentences.en: Then he moved up to foreman, running crews of 50 to 100.
sentences.cn: 接着他升任工头, 管理五十至一百个工人.

sentences.en: Then he sought the foreman , who was already on the ground.
sentences.cn: 然后,他找到已经在场上的工头.

sentences.en: There was applause as the foreman of the jury announced the verdict.
sentences.cn: 陪审团团长宣布裁定结果时响起了一片掌声。

sentences.en: There was applause from the public gallery as the foreman of the jury announced the verdict.
sentences.cn: 陪审团团长宣布判决结果时，旁听席响起了掌声。

sentences.en: Why, he was the best foreman Tara had ever had!
sentences.cn: 是啊, 他是塔拉用过的最好的工头了!

words.tran_cn: 女工头；女领班；女工监督

trans.tran_en: a worker who is in charge of a group of other workers, for example in a factory
